gboolean gpm_idle_update (  gpointer  data  ) 
 

Find out if we should call out callback.

Parameters:
data Unused
Returns:
If we should continue to poll
Note:
The load has to be less than IDLE_LIMIT so we do not suspend or shutdown halfway thru a heavy CPU utility, e.g. disk update, rpm transaction, or kernel compile.
